title: When does Aurelion Sol come out?
body:
So today the new patch got released, and even featured Aurelion Sol, though in game he is nowhere to be found. I can't wait to play him and I've alredy been waiting for 3 days thinking that "tomorrow is the release". Even when i was 100% sure he is going to come out today, is he?   

**_I really don't know how this champion release thing works, since i never particularly pay attention._**

replies.body: He's still planned to be released this patch!  No definite date/time yet, but, generally speaking, it's become standard practice to enable new champions a few days after the patch is already live so that we can be sure there's no technical problems with the patch.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MVEomPl7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-23T21:19:50.591+0000)
>
> He's still planned to be released this patch!  No definite date/time yet, but, generally speaking, it's become standard practice to enable new champions a few days after the patch is already live so that we can be sure there's no technical problems with the patch.

Mostly I just want his loading screen, wondering what his music sounds like :o

> [{quoted}](name=KimeriX,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MVEomPl7,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-03-24T13:55:26.835+0000)
>
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L_eT0S2qXBk HERE YOU ARE!!!!!!

I gots it playing in the background right now.  Really nice, especially how you can almost feel the dread or doom that he is about to bring.
hi riotbok  why are people already  making gameplay videos if he isn't out yet{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Because they have an account in the PBE, that is a special LOL server where developers release patches, champions, skins etc before they come out in the game, to test them and be sure that there are no issues. There can be a limited number of PBE accounts that expire in a certain period and to get one of them you have to ask Riot. https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe
hi riotbok  why are people already  making gameplay videos if he isn't out yet

His champion spotlight went live today.

*in general* a champ will go live the day after their spotlight goes up.

This is not a guarantee, obviously, but I would expect him tomorrow.
They haven't really released a champion on the same date as the patch for some time.
Kindred was planned to be released on the patch before, but for the lcs, it has been moved to the patch after.{{champion:203}} {{item:3070}}
Thank you very much for the information! I've been shaking constantly for 2 days nonstop. I've calmed down a bit though of you. You guys really cleared up everything! thank you again.
His champ spotlight is out so he should be released tomorrow.
